channel.title: Please help when I click runserver look what happens when you kill npcs!
channel.description:
This is my error! Please help me its ruining my server :( :( :(
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200 at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:1197) at server.main(server.java:98) ClientHandler: Accepted from 111.36.121.70.cfl.res.rr.com:1947 bokey4lyfe is signing onto server. [client-2-bokey4lyfe]: bokey4lyfe is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from 111.36.121.70.cfl.res.rr.com:1948 bokey4lyfe is signing onto server. [client-3-bokey4lyfe]: bokey4lyfe is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from 111.36.121.70.cfl.res.rr.com:1949[/code]

item.title: Please help when I click runserver look what happens when you kill npcs!
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

Go now in npchandler.java
and press cntrl g
and put: 1199
Delete that line.

Read full topic
